name: All In Your Head (Gilel)
description:
NOTE: Playing the download version as the web version has some issues. If you do want to play the web version then it's recommended to play in full screen, for some reason the camera is slightly off centered downwards if you don't. 

This game is a short story about a little gremlin reminiscing on some memories while not being able to sleep. It features scenes about hyperfixation, tunnel vision, anxiety, and panic attacks, however it's simply based off of my personal experience with those things.

Any constructive feedback is appreciated!
